name: Battle Shard
description:
My entry for Go Godot Jam 3, Theme : Evolution.

You are a Battleshard, a cybernetic being that helps protect the system's datacores and structures, some of them have been corrupt and strange anomalies are starting to appear, and have somehow managed to overide the system's defense and even turned the mighty data dragons on their side.

You must reach the corrupted cores and destroy them, to do so you'll have to find your way through the system, and deactivate the emergency barriers blocking your way with their respective switches. 

Beware the enemies seem to adapt and evolve !

How to play :

Use WASD on the keyboard to move, aim with the mouse, shoot with the left click, interact in menus with the spacebar key.

Credits :

  • All assets and code done solo during the jam
  • Except these external sources : Go Godot Jam's logo, Michroma font from GoogleFonts

Programs used :

  • Godot engine
  • Blender
  • Gimp
  • LMMS
  • SFXR

Hope you'll have fun and enjoy the game :)
